p: Background environments for climate niche comparisons and niche model calibration should include only areas that have been accessible to the populations under study [ 38]. We delimited this area by buffering a convex hull around known occurrences by 200 km ( Fig 1) in SDMtoolbox [ 34]. This approach reflects a compromise between including all environments that have been accessible to the species, and still covering a broad-enough extent to minimize extrapolation and detect climatic differences between presence and background records [ 39].
